group.name: Vertical
group.notes: The default vertical group stacks fields on top of each other on all devices.

group.name: Horizontal
group.notes: The horizontal group displays fields inline but responsively switches to vertical on mobile.

group.name: Horizontal (fixed)
group.notes: The horizontal (fixed) group looks the same across all devices and doesn't stack on mobile. A great space-saver for few fields but to be used judiciously.
